field.label: Forward Type:
field.help: Select if the rule is Pass or Block

field.label: Target Pattern:
field.help: URL pattern that specifies to which requests (i.e. URLs) this forward rule shall apply. Use / to denote "all URLs"

field.label: Http Parent IP/FQDN:
field.help: Addresses in dotted decimal notation or valid DNS names may be "." to denote "no HTTP forwarding"

field.label: Http Parent Port:
field.help: TCP ports, i.e. integer values from 1 to 65535

field.label: Socks Proxy IP/FQDN:
field.help: Only in case of socksx forward Addresses in dotted decimal notation or valid DNS names may be "." to denote "no HTTP forwarding"

field.label: Socks Port:
field.help: Only in case of socksx forward TCP ports, i.e. integer values from 1 to 65535
